snippet.title: The Collar (Action Trailer)
snippet.description:
Website: https://arizonainkstudios.com/the-collar

Each of you have been hand picked from your normal life to participate in the experiment. You should be very honored The Collar has chosen you.

You have all been fitted with an identical collar. Each collar has a timer. Each of you have random times set on your timer. Once the trial begins, each collar will start to countdown to zero.

The collar lights glow indicating how much time you have left. The collar glowing green means it has the most time. The collar glowing red means it has the least time. The collars glowing yellow are in-between.

If your collar reaches zero, you will die.

If you die before your collar reaches zero, the closest person to you will receive your remaining time.

If you give up, The Collar will kill you.

Only one will survive.
Kill or be killed. Your choice.
The Collar doesn't care.

#thecollar #collargame #thecollargame
